name: 2024 8th International Conference on Material Engineering and Manufacturing
content: Publication: Accepted and registered papers with presentation will be published in below listed journals of Scientific.Net collection. Papers will be sent for indexing by Scopus, Inspec, Chemical Abstracts Service, Google Scholar etc. The publisher will check every paper during pre-production procedure. Your paper will be published in either one of the below journals according to your paper topic. Defect and Diffusion Forum (DDF) Solid State Phenomena (SSP) Materials Science Forum (MSF) Key Engineering Materials (KEM)
